quotes.Quotation: There are three kinds of creators. The first steals from the world, the second steals from his neighbor. The third is using the inspiration source within.
A limited scientist can't see beyond matter.
A genius must always protect the mind against intruders.
The best way to learn and develop is to observe the stupidy of humanity.
The water level remains the same when the ice cube melts.
The wise seek the truth, and the fool makes his truth.
Everyone can read books, but not everyone can understand the meanings.
It is better to study for yourselves than to let a deceiver educate you.
It's easy to talk freely but harder to stick to a subject.
Languages are born out of confusion and misunderstanding.
There is a difference between knowing the word and understanding the meaning of the word.
Nothing on this earth lasts forever.
